5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas bin Malik that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to recite Qunut in the Subh prayer, and he used to supplicate in it against one of the Arab tribes for a month, then he stopped doing so

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقُنُوتِ فِي صَلاَةِ الْفَجْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Qunut in the Fajr Prayer
